environment.description: The development environment or platform used (e.g., 'Node.js v14.17.0').

additionalProperties.description: Version of the library or package used.

libraries.description: A mapping of libraries or packages used, along with their versions.

buildTool.description: The tool used for building or compiling the project (e.g., 'webpack v5.38.1').

commitHash.description: The Git commit hash corresponding to the codebase at the time of credential issuance.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the credential was generated.

operatingSystem.description: A generic description of the operating system used in the development environment (e.g., 'Linux-based OS').

hostname.description: The hashed hostname of the machine running the development environment.

ipAddress.description: The hashed IP address of the machine running the development environment.
